title: What's the font of the Titleist golf logo?
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Sergio's arm is attached to his back!   
Happy halloween.

What's up with that photo on their home page.   
It looks like something out of a bad teen fight   
movie.   
   
//joe

I'd guess it's a custom design and not a font -   
but it sure is purdy.   
   
Stephen
